Key Match Events: Rodrygo scored a stunning long-range strike in the 30th minute, making all the difference in the match.
Alisson Becker made a massive save to deny Moises Caicedo in first-half stoppage time.
Post-Match Reflections: Dorival Junior praised the team's ability to earn three points despite not playing their best, but noted that the midfield lacked unity.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a crucial World Cup Qualifying victory for Brazil, helping them leapfrog Ecuador and Venezuela from seventh to fourth place.
The team will return to the pitch on Tuesday to secure six points from two matches against Paraguay.
